meanings.definition: A person who talks too much or indiscreetly.
meanings.sent1: My little sister is such a blabbermouth when she tells all our secrets.
meanings.sent2: The blabbermouth in class couldn't keep quiet during the test.
meanings.sent3: The blabbermouth accidentally spilled the surprise party plans.
meanings.sent4: Her loose lips made her the blabbermouth of the town.
meanings.sent5: The blabbermouth's chatter filled the room with unnecessary noise.

meanings.definition: To talk too much or indiscreetly.
meanings.sent1: Please don't blabbermouth about the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: She tends to blabbermouth when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: He blabbermouthed his way through the meeting, revealing too much information.
meanings.sent4: The gossip blabbermouthed her way into trouble.
meanings.sent5: The children blabbermouthed excitedly about their day at the park.
